info.name: UBIS Provincial Grid API (2026)
info.description:
Complete API collection for the Unified Beneficiary Identity System (UBIS) - Provincial Grid

## Overview
This API connects a Provincial Capitol to 20+ Municipalities for social welfare fraud detection and beneficiary management.

## Authentication
- **Method**: Laravel Sanctum (Bearer Token Authentication)
- **Header**: `Authorization: Bearer {{api_token}}`
- **Setup**: Login via `/auth/login` to auto-populate the `{{api_token}}` variable

## Base URLs
- **Development**: `http://localhost:8000/api`
- **Production**: `https://ubis.province.gov.ph/api`

## UUID-Based Routing
**IMPORTANT**: All route parameters (beneficiary, claim, municipality, user) use UUIDs, NOT integer IDs.
- Example: `/beneficiaries/9d4e8f2a-1234-5678-90ab-cdef12345678`
- This enhances security by not exposing auto-increment IDs

## Key Concepts

### Provincial Grid Philosophy
- **Provincial Users (Super Admin)**: `municipality_id = NULL`, can view ALL records across all municipalities
- **Municipal Users (Tenants)**: `municipality_id = SET`, can only view/edit records from their municipality
- **Golden Record**: Always search for existing beneficiaries before creating new ones to prevent duplicates
- **Data Sovereignty**: Beneficiaries are shared global records (Provincial Asset)

### Fraud Detection Features
- **Hybrid Search**: Uses phonetic matching (metaphone) + Levenshtein distance for name similarity
- **Double Dipping Detection**: Flags beneficiaries receiving same assistance type within 30 days from different municipalities
- **Inter-LGU Visibility**: Municipal users can search global index but see masked data for other municipalities' beneficiaries
- **Risk Scoring**: Automated risk assessment based on claim history, frequency, and cross-municipality patterns

## Collection Variables
- `base_url`: API base URL (default: `http://localhost:8000/api`)
- `api_token`: Bearer token (auto-set via Login endpoint test script)

## Contact
UBIS Development Team | Provincial Capitol IT Division

item.name: Health Check

request.description:
Public endpoint to check if the API is running. No authentication required.

**Response**: Returns API status, version, and timestamp.

item.description: Public health check endpoint (no authentication required)

request.description:
Authenticate user and receive Bearer token.

**Request Body**:
- `email`: User's email address
- `password`: User's password
- `device_name`: Device identifier (for token management)

**Response**: Returns user object and Bearer token (auto-saved to `{{api_token}}` variable)

Get authenticated user's profile information.

**Authentication**: Required

**Response**: Returns current user object with municipality details and permissions

Revoke current access token and logout.

**Authentication**: Required

**Response**: Success message confirming token revocation

Retrieve all municipalities in the provincial grid.

**Authentication**: Required

**Query Parameters**: Standard pagination and filtering available

**Response**: Paginated list of municipalities with codes and status

Create a new municipality in the system.

**Authentication**: Required (Provincial Admin only)

**Request Body**:
- `name`: Municipality name (required)
- `code`: Municipality code (required, unique)
- `status`: active/inactive (default: active)

**Response**: Created municipality object with UUID

Get details of a specific municipality.

**Authentication**: Required

**Route Parameter**: `municipality` - Municipality UUID

**Response**: Municipality object with full details

Update municipality details.

**Authentication**: Required (Provincial Admin only)

**Route Parameter**: `municipality` - Municipality UUID

**Request Body**: Fields to update (name, code, status)

**Response**: Updated municipality object

Delete a municipality from the system.

**Authentication**: Required (Provincial Admin only)

**Route Parameter**: `municipality` - Municipality UUID

**Response**: 204 No Content on success

Retrieve all users in the system.

**Authentication**: Required (Admin only)

**Scoping**:
- Provincial users see all users
- Municipal users see only their municipality's users

**Response**: Paginated list of users with municipality details

Create a new user account.

**Authentication**: Required (Admin only)

**Request Body**:
- `name`: Full name (required)
- `email`: Email address (required, unique)
- `password`: Password (required, min 8 chars)
- `password_confirmation`: Password confirmation (required)
- `municipality_id`: Municipality UUID (null for provincial users)
- `role`: User role (provincial_admin, municipal_staff, etc.)

**Response**: Created user object with UUID

Get details of a specific user.

**Authentication**: Required

**Route Parameter**: `user` - User UUID

**Response**: User object with municipality and role information

Update user account details.

**Authentication**: Required (Admin only)

**Route Parameter**: `user` - User UUID

**Request Body**: Fields to update (name, email, role, etc.)

**Response**: Updated user object

Delete a user account.

**Authentication**: Required (Admin only)

**Route Parameter**: `user` - User UUID

**Response**: 204 No Content on success

Get list of all assistance types available in the system.

**Authentication**: Required

**Response**: List of assistance types (Medical, Burial, Educational, etc.) with codes and descriptions

**Example Types**:
- MEDICAL: Medical Assistance
- BURIAL: Burial Assistance
- EDUCATIONAL: Educational Assistance
- FINANCIAL: Financial Assistance
- FOOD: Food Assistance

Retrieve paginated list of beneficiaries.

**Authentication**: Required

**Scoping**:
- Provincial users: See ALL beneficiaries from all municipalities
- Municipal users: See only beneficiaries from their municipality (but can search global index)

**Query Parameters**:
- `page`: Page number (default: 1)
- `per_page`: Items per page (default: 15)
- `search`: Search by name or ID number

**Response**: Paginated beneficiaries with home_municipality details

body.raw:
{
    "first_name": "Maria",
    "middle_name": "Santos",
    "last_name": "Garcia",
    "suffix": null,
    "date_of_birth": "1985-06-15",
    "gender": "female",
    "civil_status": "married",
    "contact_number": "09171234567",
    "email": "maria.garcia@example.com",
    "address_line1": "Purok 3",
    "address_line2": "Barangay Poblacion",
    "home_municipality_id": "9d4e8f2a-1234-5678-90ab-cdef12345678",
    "id_type": "PhilSys",
    "id_number": "1234-5678-9012-3456",
    "is_indigenous": false,
    "is_pwd": false,
    "is_senior": false,
    "is_4ps": false
}

request.description:
Create a new beneficiary record.

**Authentication**: Required

**IMPORTANT - Golden Record Principle**: Always check for duplicates using `/intake/check-duplicate` BEFORE creating a new beneficiary to prevent duplicate records.

**Request Body**:
- `first_name`, `last_name`: Required
- `middle_name`, `suffix`: Optional
- `date_of_birth`: Required (YYYY-MM-DD)
- `gender`: male/female/other
- `civil_status`: single/married/widowed/separated
- `contact_number`: Phone number
- `email`: Email address (optional)
- `address_line1`, `address_line2`: Address components
- `home_municipality_id`: Municipality UUID (required)
- `id_type`, `id_number`: Government ID details
- Boolean flags: `is_indigenous`, `is_pwd`, `is_senior`, `is_4ps`

**Response**: Created beneficiary with auto-generated UUID and phonetic index

Get detailed information about a specific beneficiary.

**Authentication**: Required

**Route Parameter**: `beneficiary` - Beneficiary UUID

**Inter-LGU Visibility**: If beneficiary belongs to another municipality, sensitive fields may be masked

**Response**: Full beneficiary profile with claim history and risk indicators

Update beneficiary information.

**Authentication**: Required

**Route Parameter**: `beneficiary` - Beneficiary UUID

**Authorization**: Municipal users can only update beneficiaries from their municipality

**Request Body**: Fields to update (partial updates supported)

**Response**: Updated beneficiary object

Soft delete a beneficiary record.

**Authentication**: Required (Admin only)

**Route Parameter**: `beneficiary` - Beneficiary UUID

**Note**: This performs a soft delete. Record remains in database but is marked as deleted.

**Response**: 204 No Content on success

item.name: Claims

request.description:
Retrieve paginated list of claims.

**Authentication**: Required

**Scoping**:
- Provincial users: See ALL claims from all municipalities
- Municipal users: See only claims from their municipality

**Query Parameters**:
- `status`: Filter by status (pending/approved/rejected/flagged)
- `page`: Page number
- `per_page`: Items per page

**Response**: Paginated claims with beneficiary and municipality details

Get detailed information about a specific claim.

**Authentication**: Required

**Route Parameter**: `claim` - Claim UUID

**Response**: Full claim details including:
- Beneficiary information
- Assistance type and amount
- Risk score and fraud flags
- Approval/rejection history
- Disbursement proofs (if any)

item.description: Claims ledger endpoints (read-only - use Intake for creation)

item.name: Intake

request.description:
Check if a beneficiary already exists in the system using hybrid search (phonetic + Levenshtein).

**Authentication**: Required

**Golden Record Principle**: ALWAYS use this endpoint before creating a new beneficiary.

**Request Body**:
- `first_name`: First name (required)
- `last_name`: Last name (required)
- `date_of_birth`: Date of birth (optional, improves accuracy)

**Hybrid Search Strategy**:
1. Layer 1: Database filter using `last_name_phonetic` (metaphone index)
2. Layer 2: PHP Levenshtein distance ranking on full name
3. Threshold: Distance < 3 = High risk duplicate

**Response**: List of potential matches with similarity scores

Assess fraud risk for a potential claim before submission.

**Authentication**: Required

**Request Body**:
- `beneficiary_id`: Beneficiary UUID (required)
- `assistance_type_id`: Assistance Type UUID (required)
- `amount`: Requested amount (required)

**Risk Factors Checked**:
- **Double Dipping**: Same assistance type within 30 days
- **High Frequency**: Too many claims in short period
- **Inter-LGU Claims**: Claims from multiple municipalities
- **Amount Threshold**: Unusually high amounts

**Response**: Risk assessment with:
- `risk_score`: 0-100 (higher = more risky)
- `risk_level`: low/medium/high/critical
- `flags`: Array of specific risk indicators
- `recommendations`: Suggested actions

body.raw:
{
    "beneficiary_id": "9d4e8f2a-1234-5678-90ab-cdef12345678",
    "assistance_type_id": "9d4e8f2a-5678-1234-90ab-cdef12345678",
    "amount": 5000.00,
    "description": "Medical assistance for hospital bills",
    "notes": "Patient confined at Provincial Hospital",
    "claimed_at": "2026-02-05"
}

request.description:
Create a new assistance claim.

**Authentication**: Required

**Request Body**:
- `beneficiary_id`: Beneficiary UUID (required)
- `assistance_type_id`: Assistance Type UUID (required)
- `amount`: Claim amount in PHP (required)
- `description`: Claim description (required)
- `notes`: Additional notes (optional)
- `claimed_at`: Claim date (default: today)

**Automatic Risk Assessment**: System automatically runs fraud detection and assigns risk score.

**Status Flow**:
- Low risk (< 30): Auto-approved
- Medium risk (30-60): Requires manual review
- High risk (> 60): Flagged for investigation

**Response**: Created claim with UUID and risk assessment results

Get list of claims flagged for fraud investigation.

**Authentication**: Required

**Scoping**:
- Provincial users: See ALL flagged claims
- Municipal users: See only their municipality's flagged claims

**Response**: Paginated list of flagged claims with:
- Risk scores and flags
- Beneficiary details
- Assignment status
- Investigation notes count

Generate comprehensive risk report for a beneficiary.

**Authentication**: Required

**Route Parameter**: `beneficiary` - Beneficiary UUID

**Response**: Detailed risk profile including:
- Total claims across all municipalities
- Claim frequency patterns
- Double-dipping incidents
- Inter-LGU claim distribution
- Risk trend analysis
- Flagged claim history

body.raw:
{
    "beneficiary_a_uuid": "9d4e8f2a-1234-5678-90ab-cdef12345678",
    "beneficiary_b_uuid": "9d4e8f2a-5678-1234-90ab-cdef87654321",
    "verification_status": "VERIFIED_DISTINCT",
    "verification_reason": "Verified via PhilSys ID - confirmed as different people with similar names",
    "notes": "Juan Cruz (ID: PSN-1234567890) and Juan Kruz (ID: PSN-0987654321) are distinct individuals",
    "similarity_score": 85,
    "levenshtein_distance": 2
}

request.description:
Whitelist a pair of beneficiaries as verified distinct or duplicate.

**Feature**: False Positive Handler - Prevents repeatedly flagging verified pairs

**Authentication**: Required

**Authorization**:
- Provincial staff: Can whitelist ANY pair
- Municipal staff: Can only whitelist if AT LEAST ONE beneficiary is from their municipality

**Request Body**:
- `beneficiary_a_uuid`: First beneficiary UUID (required)
- `beneficiary_b_uuid`: Second beneficiary UUID (required, must be different from A)
- `verification_status`: Status (required) - "VERIFIED_DISTINCT" or "VERIFIED_DUPLICATE"
- `verification_reason`: Detailed reason (required, min 10 chars)
- `notes`: Additional notes (optional)
- `similarity_score`: Similarity score from fraud detection (optional, 0-100)
- `levenshtein_distance`: Levenshtein distance (optional)

**Use Cases**:
- **VERIFIED_DISTINCT**: Mark phonetically similar names as different people (e.g., "Juan Cruz" vs "Juan Kruz")
- **VERIFIED_DUPLICATE**: Confirm they are actually the same person

**Effect**: Pairs marked as VERIFIED_DISTINCT will be excluded from future fraud detection

**Response**: Created pair with verification details and timestamps

query.description: Filter by status: VERIFIED_DISTINCT, VERIFIED_DUPLICATE, UNDER_REVIEW, REVOKED

request.description:
Get paginated list of verified beneficiary pairs.

**Authentication**: Required

**Scoping**:
- Provincial users: See ALL verified pairs
- Municipal users: See only pairs involving their municipality

**Query Parameters**:
- `per_page`: Results per page (optional, default: 15)
- `status`: Filter by verification status (optional)

**Response**: Paginated list with:
- Pair ID (UUID)
- Both beneficiaries (name, municipality)
- Verification status
- Similarity metrics
- Verification metadata (who, when, why)

Revoke a verified pair whitelist.

**Authentication**: Required

**Authorization**:
- Provincial staff: Can revoke ANY pair
- Municipal staff: Can only revoke pairs involving their municipality

**Route Parameter**: `pair` - Verified pair UUID

**Request Body**:
- `revocation_reason`: Detailed reason for revocation (required, min 10 chars)

**Effect**: Pair status changes to REVOKED and will re-enter fraud detection

**Response**: Success message with revocation confirmation

item.description: Claim intake and fraud detection endpoints (includes False Positive Handler for whitelisting verified pairs)

item.name: Disbursement

request.description:
Approve a claim for disbursement.

**Authentication**: Required

**Authorization**: User must have 'approve-claims' permission

**Route Parameter**: `claim` - Claim UUID

**Request Body**:
- `approved_amount`: Approved amount (required, can differ from requested)
- `notes`: Approval notes (optional)

**Response**: Updated claim with approved status and disbursement details

Reject a claim.

**Authentication**: Required

**Authorization**: User must have 'reject-claims' permission

**Route Parameter**: `claim` - Claim UUID

**Request Body**:
- `reason`: Rejection reason (required)

**Response**: Updated claim with rejected status and reason

formdata.value: Beneficiary received assistance at Municipal Hall

request.description:
Upload proof of disbursement (photo with GPS coordinates).

**Authentication**: Required

**Route Parameter**: `claim` - Claim UUID

**Request Body** (multipart/form-data):
- `photo`: Image file (required, JPG/PNG, max 5MB)
- `gps_lat`: GPS latitude (optional)
- `gps_lng`: GPS longitude (optional)
- `notes`: Additional notes (optional)

**Audit Trail**: Creates permanent record of disbursement with timestamp and user information

**Response**: Created disbursement proof record with photo URL

Get all disbursement proofs for a claim.

**Authentication**: Required

**Route Parameter**: `claim` - Claim UUID

**Response**: List of disbursement proofs with:
- Photo URLs
- GPS coordinates
- Upload timestamp
- Uploader information
- Notes

item.description: Claim disbursement and approval workflow endpoints

item.name: Fraud Alerts

request.description:
Get detailed fraud alert information for a flagged claim.

**Authentication**: Required

**Route Parameter**: `claim` - Claim UUID

**Response**: Fraud alert details including:
- Risk score breakdown
- Specific fraud flags
- Similar beneficiary matches
- Cross-municipality claim history
- Investigation notes
- Assignment information

Assign a fraud alert to an investigator.

**Authentication**: Required (Supervisor/Admin only)

**Route Parameter**: `claim` - Claim UUID

**Request Body**:
- `investigator_id`: User UUID of the investigator (required)

**Response**: Updated fraud alert with assignment details

Add investigation note to a fraud alert.

**Authentication**: Required

**Route Parameter**: `claim` - Claim UUID

**Request Body**:
- `note`: Investigation note text (required)
- `is_internal`: Internal note (true) or visible to beneficiary (false)

**Response**: Created note with timestamp and author information

item.description: Fraud alert investigation and management endpoints

item.name: Dashboard

request.description:
Get overall dashboard summary statistics.

**Authentication**: Required

**Service**: `DashboardService::getSummary()`

**Scoping**: Provincial users see all data; Municipal users see only their municipality's data.

**Response**:
- `beneficiaries`: Total and active counts
- `claims`: Total, disbursed amount, flagged count, by_status, by_assistance_type
- `budget`: Allocated, used, remaining (structure differs for Provincial vs Municipal)
- `municipalities`: (Provincial only) List with budget and claim stats per municipality

Get key performance indicator cards for dashboard with month-over-month changes.

**Authentication**: Required

**Service**: `DashboardService::getMetricsCards()`

**Response**:
- `total_disbursed`: Current month amount with % change vs last month
- `beneficiaries_served`: Unique beneficiaries with disbursed claims this month
- `fraud_attempts_blocked`: Flagged claims this month with % change
- `remaining_budget`: Budget remaining with percentage and total

Get fraud alerts summary with actionable metrics.

**Authentication**: Required

**Service**: `DashboardService::getFraudAlerts()`

**Response**:
- `summary`: pending_review, under_investigation, blocked_this_month counts
- `alerts`: List of flagged claims with:
  - alert_code, alert_type, severity, status
  - beneficiary info, municipality, amount
  - risk_assessment details
  - Priority ordered: PENDING first, HIGH severity first

Get recent claim transactions for dashboard activity feed (last 10 claims).

**Authentication**: Required

**Service**: `DashboardService::getRecentTransactions()`

**Response**: List of recent claims with:
- beneficiary_name, barangay, municipality
- assistance_type, amount, status
- is_flagged, flag_reason, risk_assessment
- created_at, updated_at (ISO 8601)

Get assistance distribution by category for horizontal bar chart.

**Authentication**: Required

**Service**: `DashboardService::getAssistanceDistribution()`

**Response**:
- `categories`: List with category name, amount, count (DISBURSED claims only)
- `total_amount`: Sum of all disbursed amounts
- `total_claims`: Count of disbursed claims

Get top assistance types distribution for pie chart (budget planning).

**Authentication**: Required

**Service**: `DashboardService::getTopAssistanceTypes()`

**Response**:
- `categories`: List with assistance_type, count, total_amount, percentage, amount_percentage, label
- `total_claims`: Total count across all types
- `total_amount`: Total amount across all types
- `description`: Use case hint for budget planning

Get disbursement velocity (daily spending over last 7 days) for dual-axis line chart.

**Authentication**: Required

**Service**: `DashboardService::getDisbursementVelocity()`

**Response**:
- `daily_data`: Array with date, day_label (Mon/Tue/etc), disbursed_amount, beneficiary_count
- `period`: 'Last 7 days'
- `total_disbursed`: Sum for the period
- `total_beneficiaries`: Unique count for the period

Get savings ticker - total amount saved from blocked/rejected fraud claims (the 'Hero Stat').

**Authentication**: Required

**Service**: `DashboardService::getSavingsTicker()`

**Calculation**: Sum of amounts from flagged + rejected claims

**Response**:
- `total_saved`: Total PHP amount prevented from fraudulent payout
- `blocked_claims_count`: Number of rejected flagged claims
- `label`: 'Saved from Fraud Detection'
- `description`: Proves ROI of the fraud detection system

Get top 5 municipalities with attempted fraud (Provincial staff only).

**Authentication**: Required (Provincial staff only - returns 403 for Municipal users)

**Service**: `DashboardService::getDoubleDipperLeaderboard()`

**Response**:
- `leaderboard`: Ranked list of municipalities with:
  - rank, municipality (id, name, code)
  - fraud_attempts, blocked_count, total_amount_flagged
  - status: 'Critical' (>10), 'Warning' (>5), 'Normal'
- `title`: 'Top 5 Municipalities with Attempted Fraud'
- `description`: Actionable insight for Provincial oversight

item.description:
Dashboard analytics and statistics endpoints.

**Service Layer**: All endpoints delegate to `DashboardService` which handles tenant-scoped queries (Provincial vs Municipal data access).

**Scoping Pattern**:
- Provincial users (`municipality_id = NULL`): See aggregate data across ALL municipalities
- Municipal users (`municipality_id = SET`): See only their municipality's data

request.description:
Generate beneficiary demographics report.

**Authentication**: Required

**Query Parameters**:
- `format`: json/csv/pdf (default: json)
- `municipality_id`: Filter by municipality (optional)
- `date_from`, `date_to`: Date range (optional)

**Response**: Demographics breakdown including:
- Age distribution
- Gender distribution
- Civil status breakdown
- Indigenous/PWD/Senior/4Ps counts
- Municipality distribution
- Geographic heatmap data

Generate budget utilization report.

**Authentication**: Required

**Query Parameters**:
- `year`: Fiscal year (required)
- `municipality_id`: Filter by municipality (optional)
- `format`: json/csv/pdf (default: json)

**Response**: Budget analysis including:
- Total budget vs disbursed
- Utilization rate by municipality
- Utilization by assistance type
- Monthly burn rate
- Projected year-end utilization
- Variance analysis

Generate fraud detection summary report.

**Authentication**: Required (Admin only)

**Query Parameters**:
- `date_from`, `date_to`: Date range (required)
- `format`: json/csv/pdf (default: json)

**Response**: Fraud analysis including:
- Total flagged claims
- Fraud detection rate
- Amount saved
- Breakdown by fraud type (double-dipping, high frequency, etc.)
- Top offenders
- Municipality comparison
- Investigation status summary
- False positive rate

Generate monthly disbursement report.

**Authentication**: Required

**Query Parameters**:
- `year`, `month`: Report period (required)
- `municipality_id`: Filter by municipality (optional)
- `format`: json/csv/pdf (default: json)

**Response**: Monthly summary including:
- Total claims processed
- Total amount disbursed
- Breakdown by assistance type
- Breakdown by municipality
- Daily disbursement trends
- Top beneficiaries
- Processing time metrics
- Approval/rejection rates
